skill_constraints: Single points of failure for both Backend and DevOps.
resource_bottlenecks: Backend developer is the primary bottleneck for all feature work.
mitigation_strategies: Aggressive use of mock servers; strong documentation; tech lead as backup.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for new mid-level backend developer.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior developer's time for code reviews and mentoring.
mitigation_strategies: Pair programming for knowledge transfer; assign less complex tasks to new developer initially.
